placeInfo: {'id': '8116054', 'name': 'Anantara Peace Haven Tangalle Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 4635, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.012489, 'longitude': 80.78387, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d8116054-Reviews-Anantara_Peace_Haven_Tangalle_Resort-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.anantara.com/en/peace-haven-tangalle', 'address': 'Goyambokka Estate., Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Goyambokka Estate.', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 20, 'count2': 43, 'count3': 71, 'count4': 393, 'count5': 4108}}
text:
We stayed at the Anantara for 8 nights following 2 weeks of travelling and staying in various places in Sri Lanka.
We thoroughly enjoyed our time in Sri Lanka but what really did make it special were the Sri Lankan people themselves and nowhere epitomised this more than at the Anantara.All the staff from those working on the grounds through cleaners,restaurant staff to front of house were friendly,helpful and usually happy to engage in conversation.You are made to feel especially welcome when dining at Journeys where we enjoyed chatting with Tachila,Thisari and others,often fairly new staff but very pleased to be working there.The manager of the pool bar,Greshan,was probably the nicest person we met in Sri Lanka and his story of surviving the tsunami we will never forget,thanks for the G&T’s!Likewise to the ‘beach boys’ Nuwan,Heshan and others who ensured our place on the grass for sundowners and just couldn’t stop smiling and laughing.Great guys.Front of house was Thisal who was at the end of all our WhatsApp’s sorting out laundry,drinks and every other request.Thanks
The grounds are immaculately kept with people sweeping from sunrise to sunset and contain many different trees,shrubs and plants as well as animals and birds,well worth taking a closer look at to appreciate.Don’t miss the man who climbs the impossibly high palm trees with just a bit of rope between his feet,chopping down coconuts.
The whole complex sweeps close to the shoreline and is bookended by the Il Mare Italian style restaurant high up overlooking the cliffs and wonderful on an evening to Verala Asian themed restaurant shaped to mimic 2 coconut shells and very impressive.We ate there 3 times and were expertly looked after by Rizvi enjoying watching the chefs with their clanging blades making the kotthu or other specials.
The beach in front of the hotel can be challenging to swim in and not for the inexperienced but the adjacent public beach Goyambaku is safer but still great fun for bodyboarding.
Our all inclusive package allowed us a one hour spa treatment which is very classy and we also enjoyed the high tea experience.I wanted to try a surfing lesson and the hotel have a company called Tropic surf which is located on site and run by Shaun and Lainey which take you to a safe and quiet beach some 20 minutes away by tuktuk.Great fun,very tiring but no good if you’re 63 and unfit!
The Anantara is very much a 5 star experience.
title: 5 Star experience

text: Total class and indulgence from begin to end!A truly unique and individualised experience from arrival to departure. Thoroughly enjoyed the traditional values and mutual respect evident throughout our stay.The food in all restaurants was exquisite and everywhere was spotless and very well cared for. In particular the Italian restaurant perched on a cliff treated us to the best of cuisine in the most amazing surroundings where we were treated to stunning views and an amazing sunset. The chef also joined us and was genuinely interested in our gastronomic experience. Honestly I felt I was in another world. The local wildlife enhanced  our stay namely the chipmunks and peacocks .However star of the show was Thisari Navada our designated host who was virtually at our disposal 24/7  for guidance, info and organising everything .Thisari’s enthusiasm and friendly disposition along with her attention to detail made our stay truly unrivalled.Thank you to all involved …… a memorable experience for all the right reasons!
title: Amazing from start to finish! Unrivalled holiday experience.

placeInfo: {'id': '8116054', 'name': 'Anantara Peace Haven Tangalle Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 4635, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.012489, 'longitude': 80.78387, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d8116054-Reviews-Anantara_Peace_Haven_Tangalle_Resort-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.anantara.com/en/peace-haven-tangalle', 'address': 'Goyambokka Estate., Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Goyambokka Estate.', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 20, 'count2': 43, 'count3': 71, 'count4': 393, 'count5': 4108}}
text:
I had the pleasure of spending a pleasant stay of about 2 weeks at the Anantara Peace Haven.
The property is located in a quiet position, immersed in a large green area that offers a sense of peace and relaxation as well as the immense pleasure of seeing and appreciating up close the colorful local flora as well as the incredible fauna. Monkeys, peacocks, squirrels, birds of all kinds.
The check-in procedure was quick and smooth. The reception staff was extremely courteous and helpful in providing information on the property and the services offered, as well as on the attractions of the place.
The villa where I stayed was really spacious, well furnished, equipped with every comfort and very clean.
The breakfast buffet was particularly appreciated with a wide range of sweet and savory options that allows you to indulge in all types of eating styles.
The restaurants were also excellent, with a great variety of foods and quality service.
The property also has a beautiful swimming pool and a splendid private beach. I also had the opportunity to relax at the wellness center, which offers a variety of regenerating treatments in a relaxing environment. The service was really excellent.
The Wi-Fi connection was good in all areas of the hotel, a little weak in the pool unfortunately.
The staff is sensitive and attentive, careful to anticipate the needs and expectations of guests and always ready to help with any need. For example, I asked for some extra services to celebrate my husband's birthday and they were enthusiastic and well-disposed, helping me to create a splendid birthday, thanks to an impeccable, personalized and engaging service, which distinguishes every area of the structure. In this regard, a special thanks goes to Thushtika and Irosha, our very good SPA technicians who prepared a special surprise for us.
I also thank Mr Tharanga who made our stay simply perfect.
For this reason I would highly recommend, without a doubt, the Anantara Peace Heaven to other people..
title: The name doesn’t lie, a true paradise!

text: I stayed 2 nights at this resort to celebrate my birthday. The staff were really friendly and attentive … I had a problem in my room on the first night, and they upgraded me to a corner room with a better view, and also added a massage free of charge for all 3 of us! They surprised me during dinner , with a beautiful flower bouquet and a lovely birthday gift! And another souvenir gift upon departure.. Thank you for the amazing staff that made my stay memorable. Special thanks to the sweet Ms. Yashani  who attended to my every need. Thank you to the Operational Excellence Manager Ms. Yasuri that contacted me personally and went above and beyond to make sure that I was enjoying my stay.. Also big thanks to Mr. Manoj, Mr. Yohan, and the many other wonderful staff members that we encountered. Thank you for everything. I hope I get a chance to visit this wonderful resort again!

text:
We absolutely loved our stay at Anantara Resort. The hotel has everything you can ask for if looking for a relaxing holiday. Everything is super clean, the rooms are big and comfortable and the pool area with a view of the ocean is incredible. 

The service provided in this hotel was one of a kind! In fact, in every department it was the best service we have ever had. Starting with our personal allocated resort host, Thisari Navoda, who has been going above and beyond with her service making our stay as relaxing, comfortable and enjoyable as possible. Every request has been fulfilled immediately, we have been given perfectly tailored recommendations on how to spend the day and much more. We couldn’t have asked for a better host. 

The food at Anantara is a 10/10 as well. We are very picky when it comes to food and careful on where to eat and whom to trust. At this hotel we enjoyed everything and tested all 3 restaurants. The service is outstanding. Sean who manages the journey restaurant has been very accommodating and made our dinners very special by taking time to speak with us and ask for special requests. 
I also want to mention Krishan, one of the waiters at the restaurant. He was always super friendly, made jokes with us and made us feel super welcomed and took great care of us. 

Last but not least I want to mention the outstanding service of Mr. Meuru who has been managing our stay. We extended our stay at Anantara twice since we enjoyed it so much. Mr. Meuru always made sure to offer us the best possible rate and even arranged upgrades and included dinner for us. He offered us the best service we ever had at a hotel, period. 

To summarize, we absolutely loved our stay at Anantara and if we come back to Sri Lanka we would 100% chose this hotel as our stay. 
Big recommendation to book this hotel!!
title: Anantara is a 10/10 in every regard!

text:
We had an exceptional stay while celebrating my daughter’s and mother-in-law’s birthdays. From the moment we arrived, the staff went above and beyond to make our experience special. Thisari, our room host, was incredibly attentive. She not only ensured our stay was comfortable but also took special care of my mother-in-law when she felt unwell, arranging something thoughtful for her and even sitting with her for company.

Mr. Meuru was outstanding, assisting us from the moment we checked in, quickly accommodating our room change request, and helping with various other arrangements.

Our driver, Mr. Sisira, made our trip even more memorable. He drove us safely to the safari and, when we were short on local currency, generously stopped to buy us some fresh mangoes since it was coming in season.

This experience was everything we hoped for and more – thoughtful service, genuine kindness, and seamless arrangements. Highly recommended!
title: Exceptional Stay

placeInfo: {'id': '8116054', 'name': 'Anantara Peace Haven Tangalle Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 4635, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.012489, 'longitude': 80.78387, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d8116054-Reviews-Anantara_Peace_Haven_Tangalle_Resort-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.anantara.com/en/peace-haven-tangalle', 'address': 'Goyambokka Estate., Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Goyambokka Estate.', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 20, 'count2': 43, 'count3': 71, 'count4': 393, 'count5': 4108}}
text:
Our stay at Anantara Tangalle was a blend of comfort and minor challenges. The shallow end of the pool was perfect for kids, providing a safe and fun environment. One of the highlights was our butler, Rasith, who went above and beyond to ensure we had a seamless experience—his attention to detail was outstanding.

However, the check-in and check-out process was slower than expected. Despite providing card details for a pre-approval during booking, the staff were very insistent on receiving payment before check-in, which was a bit inconvenient.

In terms of value for money, I would rate it at 70%. The food was of good quality, although a bit pricey—especially bottled water and cola drinks. 

The resort is quite expansive, and getting around requires a buggy, but that adds to the charm of the experience. The two-bedroom pool villa was ideal for our family of four, and we’d definitely consider coming back.
title: Amazing Property, Best 2 bed Villa with a pool

roomTip: Get there as early as you can.
text:
Beautiful hotel, it has so much you can do as part of your stay so I was gutted we got their late in the afternoon.

You are allocated a personal assistant who is on call with whatever you need which is a lovely touch.

The food was delicious, breakfast was great! my friend couldn’t get enough of the crab curry in the Asian restaurant, though the desserts needs changing a bit.

The products (cream, soap shampoo etc.) were one of the nicest I’ve used in a 5* hotel.

The staff were great! I love the little touches they add when you arrive and Farwell ceremony. 

Negative 
It might have been because of the humidity but the beds were damp, we did ask for them to change the sheets which they did.

The Bathroom smelt of sewage in the morning, not sure if it was because of the rain but not great!
title: Beautiful hotel, lovely team

text:
We had a wonderful stay at the Anantara Peace Haven Resort in Tangalle. From the traditional greeting when we arrived to the moment we checked-out we were treated to first-class service. The property is simply beautiful, located as it is on the shores of a sumptuous bay. The gardens are wonderfully manicured; the menu/cuisine/wine lists varied and delicious.
We stayed in a private villa which was super-spacious, effortlessly luxurious and ultra comfortable. 
Tharanga Herath hosted us during our stay. A smile to brighten even the sunniest  Sri Lankan day, Tharanga couldn’t have made us feel more welcome, nor our experience at Anantara more enjoyable. A special thank you to him for helping to make our visit so memorable.
title: Exceeded expectations

text: We enjoyed our stay at Anantara Peace Haven Resort Tangalle a lot. Over all it was a wonderful experience. Our room with beach view was very nice and clean. There was room service with fresh water, tea and coffee twice a day. The staff at the restaurant and at the pool was very attentive. We especially ejoyed the morning and evening Yoga classes with Vinod  and he also gave us an insight in meditaton practice. The massages were very relaxing. text:
This place is magic ! Me and my partner are here on our honey moon for a few weeks and decided to high roll a little for the last week - we expected good service and a touch of class but what we got was far beyond our expectations! The staff alone made the experience so much better. Everyone was genuinely happy and engaging, remembered our names and went out of the way to help make our stay comfortable and memorable! 
Thisari was an absolute treat, she is the loveliest person in the world and personally made everything perfect and added soo many extras to our stay that we couldn’t have thought of! 
The pace is amazing as you’d expect but it was all the little things everyday that kept surprising us ! 
The food, the pool and secluded beach were all class too !
Thanks again to Thisari, Harsha and all the amazing team at Anantara that gave us the best stay ! 
Cheers - Pete & Omy
title: Above and beyond

placeInfo: {'id': '8116054', 'name': 'Anantara Peace Haven Tangalle Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 4635, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.012489, 'longitude': 80.78387, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d8116054-Reviews-Anantara_Peace_Haven_Tangalle_Resort-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.anantara.com/en/peace-haven-tangalle', 'address': 'Goyambokka Estate., Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Goyambokka Estate.', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 20, 'count2': 43, 'count3': 71, 'count4': 393, 'count5': 4108}}
roomTip: September is an excellent time to go as the resort is reasonably quiet
text:
Special and memorable holiday. 

We stayed at Anantara for eight nights and what a delightful and a very memorable experience! The resort is nestled in beautiful and luscious well kept grounds, quite rare to see wildlife living in harmony with guests and the resort team alike, certainly a peace haven. 
Our stay was made special by the dedicated team who looked after all our needs, accompanied always with a smile. 
Special mention goes to the team at the restaurant Journeys including Suresh, Ignesh, Maluk, Krishnan and Udara who are extremely courteous and friendly. 
Chef Jayantha Silva & Chef Dilan always ensured that our vegetarian needs were catered for and a very special thank you to Chef Gulwant Singh who really went the extra mile to make delicious and customised vegetarian dishes, much appreciated, felt like coming to another home.
We were always warmly welcomed by Sean Paul, nothing was any trouble and we enjoyed many chats in turn learning about the culture and people. Thank you for the Koto, a delicious local dish. 
Greshan at the pool bar always attended to our needs, in fact the entire team is a credit to the hotel including the poolside, grounds and reception team. 
Finally thank you so much to Anthony, our room host who made us feel very welcomed and organised our itinerary. 
Ayubowan and wishing you all
continued success always.
title: Special and Memorable Holiday

text:
We were greeted with a warm, traditional Sri Lankan welcome and welcomed to our personal host, Thisari.
The hotel itself is nestled in beautiful grounds with an abundance of wildlife. The room was spacious and clean with a lovely terrace and view. Chocolates and Sri Lankan delicacies were in our room on arrival which was a nice touch. The food was amazing with plenty choice and different theme nights. 
Thisari was an absolute treasure who was always on hand for any queries we had and who arranged our trips. Nothing was too much trouble. She is a credit to your hotel along with all the staff in reception, catering, housekeeping, the ‘sunshine butlers’ around the pool and the gardening team.
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would love to return in the future. Highly recommend to others

placeInfo: {'id': '8116054', 'name': 'Anantara Peace Haven Tangalle Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 4635, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.012489, 'longitude': 80.78387, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d8116054-Reviews-Anantara_Peace_Haven_Tangalle_Resort-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.anantara.com/en/peace-haven-tangalle', 'address': 'Goyambokka Estate., Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Goyambokka Estate.', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 20, 'count2': 43, 'count3': 71, 'count4': 393, 'count5': 4108}}
text:
This is one of the best resorts I’ve ever been to. From the check in to check out the guests are pampered to the absolute maximum. 

We were welcomed with a traditional Sri Lankan custom which was a new and a warm experience. The hotel assigns a personal host who will be your contact throughout your stay. Ours was Ms. Thisari and she was so courteous and friendly. I was really impressed how much they pay attention, coz since we opted for a late checkout, the host herself contacted us informed that our key cards would cease to work by noon and new cards will be sent to the room. I’ve never come across a hotel that has done that proactively. Also I would like to mention Mr. Sean and Mr suresh from the restaurant who were very courteous throughout our stay. To be honest all the staff of the hotel were well trained to be customer centric. I would also like to thank Mr. Theekshana who’s with the security department for educating us all about the area including the water sprout place near the hotel. 

As per the room; we were in a deluxe garden access room. It was very spacious, clean and will all the amenities one would need to have a luxury holiday. It even had a mini wine collection as well, inside the room. This being a base room category, we were so impressed.  It’s definitely a 10/10 for the room. 

The hotel has a well equipped and more importantly well maintained gym. It also has kids+teen Centre, a spa, badminton and tennis courts, darts, billiards and even a small canoe ride within the property. 

The kitchen staff should also be given full credit as the food was truly amazing. They have themed nights every day of the week. Both the variety and the taste should be commended. 

Overall this was one amazing experience we will cherish and will definitely be visiting again. 

Thank you all at anantara peace haven tangalle for making our stay such a wonderful experience.
title: Absolute Perfection

placeInfo: {'id': '8116054', 'name': 'Anantara Peace Haven Tangalle Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 4635, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.012489, 'longitude': 80.78387, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d8116054-Reviews-Anantara_Peace_Haven_Tangalle_Resort-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.anantara.com/en/peace-haven-tangalle', 'address': 'Goyambokka Estate., Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Goyambokka Estate.', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 20, 'count2': 43, 'count3': 71, 'count4': 393, 'count5': 4108}}
text:
From the moment we arrived to our heartfelt departure, Anantara Peace Haven Tangalle Resort offered an exquisite experience with their extraordinary welcome and farewell ceremonies. Truly unparalleled hospitality that made every moment unforgettable. 
Amazing hospitality, intricate attention to details, superb customer service, excellent food and tranquil venue are among the fond memories we will always treasure as Anantara Peace Haven Tangalle provided much more than what we expected.
The luxurious rooms at the hotel are huge which are facing the beautiful Indian Ocean. The beds and pillows are comfortable and soft. We enjoyed our long and most relaxing sleep ever during our trip. The balconies are huge with daybed and you can surely relax in the evening with the calming sound of sea waves. 
The place is fabulously beautiful with huge well manicured lawns. There are lots of beautiful animals and species around the resort. We also enjoyed their complimentary boat ride and nature walk guided by their dedicated naturalist.
We love their buffet breakfast at Journeys where they serve lots of selections to choose from. They also serve fresh juices. We also tried one of their fine dining restaurants, Verala which is near the beach with amazing setting. Their Executive Chef, Chaminda, even came over to check on the quality of food.  We truly enjoyed  the freshnesh of their ingredients and softness of meat.
The restaurant also played a movie nearby for other guests who want to relax with the lounge beds.
Kudos to all hotel staff for their personal touch especially to Hotel Manager Manoj, our butler Kavindu and of course our hotel host Kavindi who made our stay and wedding Anniversary a wonderful and memorable occasion. We came as strangers but parted as friends. 
Among the highlights of our trip is our 2- night stay at Anantara Peace Haven. A truly magical experience to cherish a lifetime.
title: Best of the best in luxury hotels

placeInfo: {'id': '8116054', 'name': 'Anantara Peace Haven Tangalle Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 4635, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.012489, 'longitude': 80.78387, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d8116054-Reviews-Anantara_Peace_Haven_Tangalle_Resort-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.anantara.com/en/peace-haven-tangalle', 'address': 'Goyambokka Estate., Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Goyambokka Estate.', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 20, 'count2': 43, 'count3': 71, 'count4': 393, 'count5': 4108}}
text:
My stay at Anantara Peace Haven in Tangalle, Sri Lanka, was truly exceptional. This hotel stands out as the premier accommodation in the area, and I would highly recommend extending your stay here. The property is seamlessly integrated with its natural surroundings, offering a range of amenities that cater to various interests.

Guests have access to a multitude of activities, including a well-equipped gym and a world-class spa, which provides an indulgent experience that rejuvenates both body and mind. 

The resort boasts two restaurants: Journeys, which offers a buffet with stunning views of the pool and ocean, and Il Mar, an Italian restaurant with an inviting oceanfront seating area that allows guests to enjoy the refreshing sea breeze and the soothing sounds of the waves.

Accommodations range from Pool View rooms to Ocean View rooms with direct beach access, and private villas also with beach access. 

The level of customer service is exceptional. The staff is consistently attentive and accommodating, always ready to assist whether it be day or night. The responsiveness is remarkable, with the host available via WhatsApp, often replying within seconds or a maximum of ten minutes. The resort manager ensures that all needs are met throughout the stay.

The dining experience is equally impressive. The food is both delicious and hygienic, and while in-room dining is available with a signed waiver, it is advisable to dine in the restaurants to fully appreciate the breathtaking views that enhance the culinary experience.

In addition to the aforementioned benefits, American Express cardholders are entitled to the following exclusive perks:

- Early check-in at 12 PM, subject to availability
- A one-category room upgrade upon check-in, contingent on availability†
- Daily breakfast for two guests
- A US$ 100 property credit to be utilized during the stay
- Complimentary Wi-Fi access
- Guaranteed 4 PM check-out
title: Unparalleled Luxury and Serenity at Anantara Peace Haven Tangalle

placeInfo: {'id': '8116054', 'name': 'Anantara Peace Haven Tangalle Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 4635, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.012489, 'longitude': 80.78387, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d8116054-Reviews-Anantara_Peace_Haven_Tangalle_Resort-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.anantara.com/en/peace-haven-tangalle', 'address': 'Goyambokka Estate., Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Goyambokka Estate.', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 20, 'count2': 43, 'count3': 71, 'count4': 393, 'count5': 4108}}
text: We are so glad to have stayed at Anantara Peace Haven in Tangalle.  While we initially booked the Anantara Kalutara, we switched to Peace Haven a few days prior to our stay.  Booking through the Anantara app allowed this flexibility.  The extra 1.5 - 2 hour drive to Tangalle was totally worth it.  Everything at the resort was top notch.  A feature that particularly stood out was that our stay was made extra special by our Personal Resort Host, Thisari Navoda, who made sure that every part of the experience was perfect.  She also managed to arrange a beautiful cake for my wife's birthday including a handwritten card with hand-drawn illustrations done personally by her.  The property location is absolutely amazing.  An overlooked feature is the yoga shala which sits on top of a cliff and has a magnificent view overlooking the ocean.  Our yoga session (through the resort's complimentary activities schedule) was one of the highlights of our stay.   Special thanks to Suresh, our Waiter at Journey's restaurant, who greeted us everyday with a beautiful smile and a very kind attitude.  We stayed in a premier garden view room which has a terrace with direct access to the garden area and is only a few meters from the lovely beach.  The beach itself is not suitable for swimming but is wonderful for dipping our toes in the water and relaxing in one of the sun loungers.
title: Quick Break by the Beach

ownerResponse:
{'id': '967761338', 'text': "Dear 248marinod,
Ayubowan from Anantara Tangalle Sri Lanka!
Thank you for taking the time to share your detailed feedback about your recent stay at our resort in Sri Lanka. While I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed many aspects of our resort, such as the beautiful property, the variety of dining options, and our top-notch facilities, I am truly sorry that your check-in experience did not meet your expectations.
Please accept our sincerest apologies for the delay in preparing your room and for the miscommunication regarding your extended stay. We strive to provide a seamless and welcoming experience for all our guests, and we fell short in this instance. Your feedback regarding the service during check-in and the escort to your room is invaluable, and we will be addressing these concerns with our team to ensure that we provide better training and support for our staff.

placeInfo: {'id': '8116054', 'name': 'Anantara Peace Haven Tangalle Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 4635, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.012489, 'longitude': 80.78387, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d8116054-Reviews-Anantara_Peace_Haven_Tangalle_Resort-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.anantara.com/en/peace-haven-tangalle', 'address': 'Goyambokka Estate., Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Goyambokka Estate.', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 20, 'count2': 43, 'count3': 71, 'count4': 393, 'count5': 4108}}
text:
The check-in was a messy experience, they promised to release the room  by 2pm ,but that didn't happen until we got disgusted and shouted at them to get it ready way past  their check-in time. This was 1 thing. Then, we were introduced to our escort of the room, Yashani, who was clueless about what she was supposed to do, as she was on the job just 5 months in. She certainly aggravated the situation. Finally, the manager Kevin came and understood and at least he was  good at handling the problem...
     At the Stay, we enjoyed the large property and needed to explore more, therefore,  we extended the stay from the original 2 nights  to 3 nights,and while this is a compliment to the hotel, the escort Yashani, immediately called us to check at what time we would Check out the next day, when it was still 11am the previous day!
 She needed training on how to treat a guest , and this is a 5 star Resort, and could do with experienced staff.
     Apart from that,   Anantara Peace Haven is truly a magical experience. From the peacock that appears everywhere you look. The herb garden and the paddyfield is wonderful to walk through. The caretakers are ever willing to help you....
        The beautiful boat ride through the mangroves is an experience to be had...
        The buffet was good with a lot of variety for everyone. The chefs are ever willing to serve what you want.
The serving staff are always there to help...
    The GYM is modern and best of all open 24 hrs... the Best GYM of all hotels I've been to, and the 2 Swimming Pools are gorgeous. 
The pool attendant was very kind. 
So this was a beautiful resort, great food, stunning rooms, turn down service, location great. Just that the Check in Staff and escorts have to be better at handling a valued guest and need to know how to undo a bad situation . Hopefully, this improves...
title: Beautiful resort, but check-in staff inexperienced...

text: This resort is spectacular! We opted for a villa room which was a worthy upgrade and nice to have a private pool and outdoor area. The staff was all very kind and accommodating. The breakfast buffet is great, as are the stunning ocean views. If you are interested in nature, the nature walk is awesome and really informative! Lovely stay!
title: Great beach resort!

placeInfo: {'id': '8116054', 'name': 'Anantara Peace Haven Tangalle Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 4635, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.012489, 'longitude': 80.78387, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d8116054-Reviews-Anantara_Peace_Haven_Tangalle_Resort-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.anantara.com/en/peace-haven-tangalle', 'address': 'Goyambokka Estate., Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Goyambokka Estate.', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 20, 'count2': 43, 'count3': 71, 'count4': 393, 'count5': 4108}}
text:
We used this resort to decompress after our round trip through Sri Lanka’s center and national parks. 
The hotel while big is well run, maintained and sits in a great location. 
The beach is beautiful though the sea is not for swimming. The nearby bay (walk 100 meters by foot) has more regular surf and allows for boogie boards and wave splashing. Still we are talking serious waves so only experienced swimmers should go out. 
The double storied pool offers a lot of fun though with 1,20 meters depth is not for serious swimming. 
The food choice in the restaurants is great, high quality and with enough variation in the buffets to enjoy a week. Il Mare sits spectacular over the cliff, we would recommend the lunch where you can take in the sights. 
Lot of activities are offered and the staff puts in a lot of heart and friendliness while exercising a level of professionalism not always found in Sri Lanka. Yoga overlooking the sea is highly recommended. A lovely feature is their well stocked library of books in many languages. 

The main drawback as mentioned elsewhere is the pricing policy which comes in at a factor of 2 to 2.5 of other leading Sri Lankan five star properties. They seem to get away with it, and are clearly oriented at a global price level but it still feels out of place. This will hold us back from returning, to be honest.
title: Great place to relax and chill

placeInfo: {'id': '1229302', 'name': 'Mangrove Beach Cabanas & Chalets', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 731, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.041438, 'longitude': 80.82056, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d1229302-Reviews-Mangrove_Beach_Cabanas_Chalets-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': None, 'address': 'Kapuhenwela Marakolliya, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Kapuhenwela', 'street2': 'Marakolliya', 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 6, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 44, 'count4': 144, 'count5': 525}}
roomTip: Bring your snorkel
text:
Visited the Mangrove beach Chalets for the second time and had an amazing experience! The secluded beach and the food is the main reason we keep coming back to this gem of a place! 

From your first interaction from Nethmini at the front desk you know that you have picked the right place for your holiday! 

Chef Kusum whips up some world-class seafood dishes and salads! 
Ravindu and Prabath with their amazing hospitality make you feel right at home! Their warm and friendly service is the true definition of ‘Sri Lankan hospitality’ !!

If a relaxed beach holiday is what you want then this is the place to visit! The beach is serene and clean! Don’t forgot to bring your snorkeling gear!
title: One of a kind relaxing secluded beach

placeInfo: {'id': '1229302', 'name': 'Mangrove Beach Cabanas & Chalets', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 731, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.041438, 'longitude': 80.82056, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d1229302-Reviews-Mangrove_Beach_Cabanas_Chalets-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': None, 'address': 'Kapuhenwela Marakolliya, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Kapuhenwela', 'street2': 'Marakolliya', 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 6, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 44, 'count4': 144, 'count5': 525}}
text: This was an excellent experience! The beach offered solitude and comfort. We were able to calm and slow down after long trip. The service was excellent. Lovely meals too! It offers opportunities for walks along the beach. The waves are soothing and allow you to meditate or read a book.
title: A great place to get away!

placeInfo: {'id': '1229302', 'name': 'Mangrove Beach Cabanas & Chalets', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 731, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.041438, 'longitude': 80.82056, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d1229302-Reviews-Mangrove_Beach_Cabanas_Chalets-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': None, 'address': 'Kapuhenwela Marakolliya, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Kapuhenwela', 'street2': 'Marakolliya', 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 6, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 44, 'count4': 144, 'count5': 525}}
text:
It looks like i'm the only one who wasn't happy with the location . Yes, the beach is beautiful, but you can't swim or even play in the water  because the waves are  way too strong. So basically, is there just  for you to look at it. 
As an active person, I feel very bored  after two days . There is nothing there to do except walking up and down the beach or lying down and reading your book. 
The bathroom is in the basement , and you have to wait the longest time for hot water.
title: Not for everyone

placeInfo: {'id': '1229302', 'name': 'Mangrove Beach Cabanas & Chalets', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 731, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.041438, 'longitude': 80.82056, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d1229302-Reviews-Mangrove_Beach_Cabanas_Chalets-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': None, 'address': 'Kapuhenwela Marakolliya, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Kapuhenwela', 'street2': 'Marakolliya', 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 6, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 44, 'count4': 144, 'count5': 525}}
text: The setting is very nice , with palmtrees and a beachbar . The rooms are spacious with view onto the sea. Staff is very friendly and helpfull.Breakfast and dinner with fresh ingredients. Just the way we like it ! Only one ( minor ) remark for visitors with small children : There is no swimmingpool and the sea is rather rough . Swimming is allowed a bit further. But overall a place I can highly recommend
title: Best Sri Lanka seaside resort ever

placeInfo: {'id': '1229302', 'name': 'Mangrove Beach Cabanas & Chalets', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 731, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.041438, 'longitude': 80.82056, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d1229302-Reviews-Mangrove_Beach_Cabanas_Chalets-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': None, 'address': 'Kapuhenwela Marakolliya, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Kapuhenwela', 'street2': 'Marakolliya', 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 6, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 44, 'count4': 144, 'count5': 525}}
text:
Mangrove Beach Cabanas and Chalets is actually two separate little resorts separated by the lagoon that stretches behind the coast here.  We stayed at both.  The staff at both places were very kind and accommodating, changing our booking at very short notice after I had to stay two extra days in Colombo due to illness.
Both places have wonderful sea views and sounds, although the Cabanas are a bit further from the sea.
The cabanas and chalets are all very comfortable and well furnished, and the cooking is excellent.  My only disappointment was that we couldn't swim in the sea as it was too rough.
title: Good food and beautiful beach views

placeInfo: {'id': '1229302', 'name': 'Mangrove Beach Cabanas & Chalets', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 731, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.041438, 'longitude': 80.82056, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d1229302-Reviews-Mangrove_Beach_Cabanas_Chalets-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': None, 'address': 'Kapuhenwela Marakolliya, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Kapuhenwela', 'street2': 'Marakolliya', 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 6, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 44, 'count4': 144, 'count5': 525}}
text: This beach bar is my paradise in Tangalle! The view is breathtaking, the drinks and food are top-notch, and the atmosphere is unbelievably friendly. I practically lived there when I was in Tangalle – hands down, my favorite spot on earth! 🏖️🍹

ownerResponse:
{'id': '973549380', 'text': "Unforgettable? Me too.

Unexpected moments often remind me of my good fortune and privileged life as an hotelier. One privalege, loafing around in the bar with a glass of wine in my hand, swapping stories with the interesting folk that I meet, came to the fore spending time with you both. We are kindred spirits in many ways I think, so thank you for sharing your time, you are a joy to host. 

Your eloquent praise on this forum and in person is heartwarming, humbling and second to none and I sincerely thank you for it. But, it is your superb company and old school good manners (a rarity these days) that I shall remember always. Needless to say, you will always be welcome at 'Oceanfront @ Buckingham Place' (cheeky, but please feel free to copy your fab review to our restaurant listing!) and I shall look forward to your return.

By no means their spokesperson, I thank and toast you both on behalf of Rekwa’s nesting sea turtles and human community. Whilst many in the community are yet to fully appreciate your conservation initiative and, your effort I know seems akin to having teeth pulled, progress does come with each visit, slowly but surely, visible or not. Rome wasn’t built in a day but it turned out just fine!

Until next time gentlemen…

Warm regards & respect
Nick & the Team
", 'lang': 'en', 'publishedDate': '2024-10-12', 'responder': 'Buckingham Place', 'connectionToSubject': 'Owner'}
placeInfo: {'id': '1943029', 'name': 'Buckingham Place', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 1184, 'locationString': 'Rekawa, Netolpitiya, Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.047304, 'longitude': 80.855316, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g2260795-d1943029-Reviews-Buckingham_Place-Rekawa_Netolpitiya_Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://buckinghamplace.lk/', 'address': 'Rekawa Beach Road Rekawa Village, Rekawa, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Rekawa Beach Road', 'street2': 'Rekawa Village', 'city': 'Rekawa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 1, 'count3': 9, 'count4': 30, 'count5': 1143}}
text: I recently had the great pleasure of dining at Buckingham Place. It was an unforgettable experience in the most breathtaking surroundings. It was apparent as soon as we arrived that a great deal of thought and love has gone in to creating such a magical place. From the luscious tropical gardens to the glorious design and decor of the dining and bar area it managed to feel exclusive yet extremely welcoming. It is the kind of setting where I imagine Bond and Hemingway would happily settle. We started the evening with superb cocktails in the bar/lounge area to a soundtrack of the Indian Ocean and some magnificent jazz. Unobtrusive yet wonderfully atmospheric. We then moved to the airy dining room which looks out onto one of the pools surrounded by palms and the white sands below. I ordered the sesame crusted tuna salad with fresh mango and a miso/wasabi dip which was one of those dishes I will forever try to recreate but will never come close to succeeding. It was exquisite and I would return to Sri Lanka for that alone. The service was also superb. The staff were attentive but not overly so. They seemed to appear when we needed something but were not watching our every move. I can not recommend Buckingham Place highly enough. I plan on returning there as soon as I can. Magnificent.
title: Unforgettable experience.

ownerResponse:
{'id': '971653309', 'text': 'Please come back!!

Thank you for coming to stay, and then taking time to post a truly helpful stand-out review. We are proud to read it this morning and I am reminded personally, how fortunate we are to still boast the best guest list on the island in our 14th year.

Many one night stay guests have become regulars over the years and folk we see as friends. Most tell me they rarely or never return to a hotel only ours, so I hope you will as they have, and you’ve found a sanctuary that remains in your hearts always. 

Thank you for your valued custom and good company, moreover, thank you for your respect and kind empathy for us all. Until next time and always I wish you happy travels and, a blissfully happy life!

ownerResponse:
{'id': '967448330', 'text': 'Thank you…

Thank you, for coming to stay and then following up with a helpful review, one both complimentary and objective as one expects from seasoned travelers. I’m delighted by your positive comments and will try addressing your observations by means of explanation.
 
First, especially through rainy seasons, Sri Lanka’s fascinating (to me) bio diversity can occasionally come too close, irrespective of the lengths those of us with open air facilities go to in order to sanitize and prevent it. Even during hot dry periods in the tropics, wildlife can present challenges to guests and hoteliers alike; often we can fear the unknown in my experience. To give you perspective and reassure others, I have lived on the property for 22 years and to my knowledge, nobody has experienced more than minor insect stings and thankfully mosquitoes are rare due to regular fogging and frequent inspection of gutters, gullies, rooftops and drains.
      
Boarding options. I agree with you, B&B is (generally) best option, unless one normally eats heartily three times daily or prefers travel with a fixed meals budget. Extensive breakfast and lunch menus are complimented by five short varied menus rotating over five nights, with bespoke cooking an option at every meal time. We encourage guests to take advantage of a late breakfast and all day dining and often, due to this and generous portions, some find two meals more than adequate. As all meals are al a carte and prepped/cooked freshly to order from scratch, timing can be an issue I agree, but most dishes can be ordered and eaten within an hour except for some of our local options. I’m sorry you missed desert so as not to miss a turtle, during peak nesting months (Feb-Jul) turtles are more plentiful and thus, one need not let one get in the way of desert! I have made note to provide more clarity on this in future so thank you for raising it.

Thank you for taking time to share your experience here on Trip Advisor. I hope overall you felt comfortable, safe and and at home with us, and have returned home with fond memories of your stay. Finally, thank you for your valuable custom, kind feedback and fine company, please come again soon - hopefully the pool will be a bit warmer next time!

Warm regards and respect,

Nick & the Team
', 'lang': 'en', 'publishedDate': '2024-08-29', 'responder': 'Buckingham Place', 'connectionToSubject': 'Owner'}
placeInfo: {'id': '1943029', 'name': 'Buckingham Place', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 1184, 'locationString': 'Rekawa, Netolpitiya, Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.047304, 'longitude': 80.855316, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g2260795-d1943029-Reviews-Buckingham_Place-Rekawa_Netolpitiya_Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://buckinghamplace.lk/', 'address': 'Rekawa Beach Road Rekawa Village, Rekawa, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Rekawa Beach Road', 'street2': 'Rekawa Village', 'city': 'Rekawa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 1, 'count3': 9, 'count4': 30, 'count5': 1143}}
text:
A very colourful hotel, which provides a beautiful view of the lagoon. The room is extremely large, with an even larger bathroom - which had both a round tub and a large shower. The shower area is open-air, which can be definitely romantic, however, we did have some friendly birds get trapped inside the bathroom, and some insects roaming around as well. 

The staff and owner (who lives on site) are very friendly, and there is a snooker table as well as board games for those rainy days in. Dinner and breakfast are a la carte, so it may not make sense to purchase half board, as opposed to just ordering what you want to eat on the day, as the menu is the same. If you want to go watch the turtles after dinner, make sure you ask for an early dinner slot. We were told that 1 hour was enough, but we had to skip dessert because 1.5hrs into the meal we were still not served. 

The infinity pool is gorgeous, and very relaxing (although a bit cold).
title: A very colourful place to stay

ownerResponse:
{'id': '967447471', 'text': 'The place is abuzz…

I proudly share your heartfelt review with the team this morning, as it underlines for us all that we are still ‘on-message’; that a hotel can be more than a bed for the night if only it tries.

Your kind words of support touch us all, thank you, and will surely inspire others who seek a sanctuary aspiring to send everyone home with fond memories, memories of a country I am lucky to call home.

Keeping everyone happy all of the time is a lofty aspiration to say the least, given the diversity of a travelers needs, their age, expectations and past experience, so, when we see it on their face and are told that we have our efforts are all the more worthwhile. Thank you for sharing your happiness with us and the world on this forum.
 
Lastly, thanks again for your valuable good custom and great company, we enjoyed your time with us but wish it had been longer. I wish you and your family a very healthy and blissfully happy life – and hope you keep us on the ‘must return’ list always - and yes please, for a longer stay!

Until next time…

Our warm regards and respect,

Nick and the Team     
', 'lang': 'en', 'publishedDate': '2024-08-29', 'responder': 'Buckingham Place', 'connectionToSubject': 'Owner'}
placeInfo: {'id': '1943029', 'name': 'Buckingham Place', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 1184, 'locationString': 'Rekawa, Netolpitiya, Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.047304, 'longitude': 80.855316, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g2260795-d1943029-Reviews-Buckingham_Place-Rekawa_Netolpitiya_Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://buckinghamplace.lk/', 'address': 'Rekawa Beach Road Rekawa Village, Rekawa, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Rekawa Beach Road', 'street2': 'Rekawa Village', 'city': 'Rekawa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 1, 'count3': 9, 'count4': 30, 'count5': 1143}}
roomTip: Don’t hesitate to go
text: I wanted to be back to the uk before writing this review to give credit to this amazing place. We spent 2 weeks in Sri Lanka. After staying 3 nights at Buckingham’s place we could not avoid comparing any hotels we stayed to Nick’s place. Buckingham’s is more than an hotel. It’s a place where you feel at home. You are not clients… you are guests invited to share this little place of paradise. You can’t fault anything: the amazing rooms, the open sky shower, the attention to details, the food but most importantly the staff. They will be at the same time discreet but attentive to your any needs. We enjoyed so much our stay, listening to Nick’s story and passion for Sri l and for his life project. Would we come back… any time but for longer. Thank you Nick, Talpa and all the staff. You have made our stay so special.
title: Unique

ownerResponse:
{'id': '962316704', 'text': "Exceptional review, exceptional guests...

Sincere thanks on behalf us all. Thanks for returning, bringing your friends, for supporting us magnificently with your custom and this second, truly exceptional review – above all, thank you for becoming part of this place and our lives.

We all use hotels, have our favorites and occasionally return, but rarely do we expect or find more than a bed for the night and (usually) something to complain about! Often, our ‘baggage’ goes before us to make us cynical and wary of what to expect of the hotel, its staff and fellow travelers. Thus, we keep our guard up and ourselves to ourselves, invariably missing what’s in front of our eyes including the good company of others. Not so with you! From the minute you arrived for your first stay to the end of your last, you made yourselves at home in every sense, endearing yourselves to the entire team, other guests and me personally. To read your remarkable accolade ours is your 'second home and the absolute benchmark by which we judge elsewhere’ I am genuinely moved. Yes, we see you as regulars already, but there was no question by the end of your first stay you would become so, and I look forward to sharing Christmas with you both and then welcome you back next July. You are the very first to book another two stays before leaving the hotel – this is an amazing compliment, I thank you again.            

All guests are special, nothing is too much trouble and everyone deserves to go home with fond memories has become our ethos. Some folk however, as you do, sprinkle a little magic of their own to make their holiday happier, both for themselves and others. You bring out the best in us with your empathy, sensitivity and not least, sense of humour, especially when we get it wrong as inevetbly we do at times. Personally, sharing time with you is not just ‘my job as host but a privalege – even when you’re a grumpy old man!!    

Thanks for your valuable custom, great company and OUR happy memories. Until next time, take care of yourselves, keep living life to the full while sharing the magic you are as a couple with every soul that you meet.  

Big hugs from us all
Nick, Kalpa and your Team xx
", 'lang': 'en', 'publishedDate': '2024-07-29', 'responder': 'Buckingham Place', 'connectionToSubject': 'Owner'}

roomTip: Book!!!
text:
Our second time visiting and loving this utterly fabulous unique boutique hotel! Everything from the setting to the location is perfect! Nothing, absolutely nothing is too much trouble and every member of the excellent staff give 100% to looking after you and making you feel wanted, part of their lives and in every moment looked after and valued to such a fabulous level! They make me smile inwardly and outwardly and the pleasure they generate is just .. well just exquisite! You are engaged with on every single level. Room staff / garden staff / stewards / leads absolutely everyone work tirelessly to seamlessly make your stay extra special.
What do I love most? Everything! The resident dogs Gracie B  and Bella even welcome you (Well when Gracie B warms to you). The rooms are spotless. The bathrooms are unique and I adore the open roof touch that even when a rainfall comes adds to the specialness of this place! The Spa is likewise a fabulous moment in this extraordinary place! 
Thank you all so very much!!
We are coming back and are privileged to be now called regulars!
We love it!!!
title: For us it’s our second home and the absolute benchmark by which we judge elsewhere!!

ownerResponse:
{'id': '960599540', 'text': 'Please Do…

The title of your fabulous review says it all and made me smile this morning! Thank you for this and for going on to share why a repeat visit might be required. For us it it was a pleasure and privalege to host you, so quite naturally we too wish you could have stayed longer. Hopefully there will be a next time and, an opportunity for us to shine once again.
     
Sri Lanka surprises most on their first visit, and for many, continues doing so time after time. My own early experiences of the islands glorious diversity, idiosyncrasies and welcoming spirit are what brought me back and hefted me to the island for the last 22 years. There is so much to do, even within a short radius of the hotel, and the same can be said of pretty much everywhere here. I’m delighted you’ve sampled this for yourselves with a wonderful holiday, but also that this was only the first of many equally wonderful visits.

Thank you for your excellent company and kind empathy for us all. Thanks for your valuable custom and again, your fabulous review. Until we hopefully meet again and always, I wish you happy ad safe travels and a blissfully happy life - with enduring fond memories of Sri Lanka and Buckingham Place.

Yes, please do come again!

Warm regards and respect

Nick, Kalpa and the Team  
', 'lang': 'en', 'publishedDate': '2024-07-21', 'responder': 'Buckingham Place', 'connectionToSubject': 'Owner'}
placeInfo: {'id': '1943029', 'name': 'Buckingham Place', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 1184, 'locationString': 'Rekawa, Netolpitiya, Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.047304, 'longitude': 80.855316, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g2260795-d1943029-Reviews-Buckingham_Place-Rekawa_Netolpitiya_Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://buckinghamplace.lk/', 'address': 'Rekawa Beach Road Rekawa Village, Rekawa, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Rekawa Beach Road', 'street2': 'Rekawa Village', 'city': 'Rekawa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 1, 'count3': 9, 'count4': 30, 'count5': 1143}}
text:
Buckingham Place was our final stop on an action packed 2 week itinerary around Sri Lanka. I only wish we could have stayed for longer than 3 nights as it is the perfect place to kick back and relax. The rooms are extremely spacious (the large redundant space in the bathroom is calling out for a freestanding bath!) and comfortable. 

We loved the pool area and the pool table in the games room was well used by my sons. The beach is accessible through the hotel grounds - although the sea was too rough to even paddle during our stay, it’s a lovely stretch to walk along. We were even accompanied by Bella the very friendly hotel dog on one of our walks!

The food in the vibrant restaurant is fantastic - there were some great alternatives to curry which we’d rather had our fill of by the end of the trip. The breakfast crepes and the seared tuna were delicious and my boys were very appreciative of the Marmite and Heinz Ketchup! 

The staff at Buckingham Place are a real credit to the hotel - attentive, accommodating and hospitable throughout. 

Thank you Buckingham Place for a magical end to a wonderful holiday in Sri Lanka.
title: Repeat visit required!

ownerResponse:
{'id': '959891236', 'text': 'Over the moon…

Thank you very much indeed, we are over the moon this morning having read your review – it is pinging’ around the team as I write! 

Yours is a delightful family and a genuine pleasure to host. Everyone enjoyed serving you and appreciated your empathy and sincere respect. It could go without saying really, we would be thrilled to welcome you back.

As you know, we can keep guests busy if they want to be, but most are similar to yourselves, they simply yearn a place to slip off their wristwatch and kick off their shoes unashamedly, a place where a little laziness is embraced. It was a joy seeing you relax, or as I say go-with-the-program, So thank you choosing us for some feet-up time, and for following up with this beautiful review. Your kind praise is perfectly timed and will certainly help us, as folks in you footsteps begin planning their winter hols. As for it being a dream to return? Please keep reminiscing until you make that dream come true - you would be surprised by how many do return, the really lucky ones come year after year! 

Thank you. Until next time and always I wish you safe and happy travels, enduring fond memories and, a blissfully happy life!

Warm regards and respect

Nick, Kalpa & the Team

text:
We stayed for six nights in a Lagoon View Family Bedroom suite at Buckingham Place. We loved every minute and since returning home we are still reminiscing!
What a hotel…from the beautiful complimentary Italian coffee delivered to our room once we woke to the enjoyable dining experience each night. The food is really the best and it comes with outstanding service. Nothing is ever a problem! We came to rest and we did just that…lazed by the pool and listened to the sounds of the sea and nature. It really would be a dream to return. Thank you to Nick, Kalpa and the team.
title: Absolute dream!

ownerResponse:
{'id': '951567653', 'text': "What a fabulous review – thank you...

As I ‘ping’ your wonderful compliments around the team this morning, they are replying with ‘smileys’ and ‘thumbs up' plus, you humble me mercilessly so I’m blushing!!

It’s our off-season as you know, so you’ve seen us at our worst, grey skies, rain an’ all. That you enjoyed your stay no less and write so passionately about it is both testimony to the hotel and your experience as a well seasoned traveler. I am so pleased that you had a good time and your stay gave you some much needed feet up time. 

Your review is simply spectacular and as good as they get. It reassures everyone in your footsteps or wavering, that Sri Lanka is good to go whatever the season. Rarely are visitors inconvenienced by the weather in Sri Lanka, not unless they come purely for a sun tan, if anything it’s rainy seasons that keep our gardens and this wonderful island lush and beautiful.

Thank you for coming to stay and for supporting us so eloquently and passionately. Everyone whom you met enjoyed spoiling you both, whilst I enjoyed your enthusiasm and great company immensely. So now you’ve found us, please don’t be strangers.

Until next time..

Big hugs to you both,

Nick & the Team                      
", 'lang': 'en', 'publishedDate': '2024-05-19', 'responder': 'Buckingham Place', 'connectionToSubject': 'Owner'}

roomTip: I have a simple tip....stay as long as you can, May and June are relaxing months so an idea to look at.
text:
Buckingham Place has got to be a clear favourite out of many hotels I've visited in Sri Lanka. It really is home from home, from the time you arrive it has hospitality in abundance. Nick Buckingham is not only the owner but he makes this a very special experience. The staff are superb, Kalpa and his team are simply fantastic. As a person who works in the tourism sector in Sri Lanka I can without a doubt say....this should be top of your list to stay. Once you come and stay you will know and understand the reason for me raving about this one of a kind property. I call it a property but it's way more than that...for me it's so relaxing and inviting, you actually don't want to do anything but forget everything and bask in the warmth and kick back and chill. The rooms are beautiful, bathrooms are wonderful, the food and ambience just tremendous. This is a true GEM and not to be missed. Nick you open your arms to everyone what a beautiful quality and it really is home.
So it leaves me to say you must come and see Nick, Kalpa and the team...remember you heard it from me. Well done xx
title: A stunning hotel you must not miss...it's a gem.

ownerResponse:

To read. ours was ‘one of the best hotels we have ever stayed in anywhere on the planet’ is as heartwarming as compliments can be, more so I think, because I remember you as discerning travelers at all levels but, with a penchant for quality, comfort and luxury. Until next time and always, I wish you happy travels and a blissfully happy life, and look forward to welcoming you back to Buckingham Place very soon.

Warm regards and respect,
Nick & the Team

roomTip: Simple go
text: After a hectic 6 days of travel across the country we found ourselves in a hidden treasure. Fortunate enough to have lifetime status with the worlds’ largest hotel groups, but we choose here. Nick and team are running one of the best hotels we have ever stayed in anywhere on the planet. We changed our plans so that we could stay longer. We are planning our return already. See you soon guys! Douglas and Lorna
title: Outstanding and faultless. Must be experienced.

text: Many places call themselves boutique hotels but Buckingham Place is truely the definition of what that really is. Fabulous suites, delicious meals, knowledgeable and attentive staff in a glorious location with excellent facilities make this place our favourite resort in Sri Lanka. All this is overseen by the hospitable owner, Nick Buckingham, who has lovingly developed the resort over many years, providing valuable employment for the locals and has built up a well trained crew. Nothing was too difficult and any need was happily accommodated. We will be back for our 3rd visit next year.
title: The True Definition of a Boutique Hotel.

ownerResponse:
{'id': '949686079', 'text': 'What a lovely surprise!

Thank you very much for dropping by, and, for your thoughtful thumbs up for what you found. 
I’m delighted our welcome was as warm as ever and our hospitality measured up, if you pass this way again please be sure to check we still pass the test!

For the benefit of others who might read this; the hotel and restaurant are limited in size and often operate at capacity. Both have a minimum guest age requirement (6yrs) and also close at times for maintenance and our own holidays. We simply ask everyone therefore, please call ahead to pre-book. As you found, we will heartily welcome travelers in need through our gates whenever we can, be they lost, thirsty, bedraggled or otherwise!!

I truly hope you’ll visit us again, maybe to stay next time?? In the meantime, on behalf of us all, I send thanks for your valued custom and smashing review. I wish you fond memoires of Sri Lanka, safe and happy travels and a blissfully happy life.

Warm wishes

Nick & the Team

text: We arrived at Buckingham Place after getting very lost looking for the turtle hatchery. We had to walk in complete darkness along beach looking for hatchery only to be 90mins too early! So we went for a drink at Buckingham place, we must of looked very bedraggled,  and we were so so hot. The staff were wonderful, escorting us to the bar by torchlight, bringing us cold flannels, to mop our brows and generally made us very welcome. The owner a little later on introduced himself and again made us very welcome. We felt very looked after and were so grateful for their hospitality. Would highly recommend, the hotel is beautiful!
title: Welcoming and hospitable

roomTip: The sea was too rough to swim so the beach is very quiet but there is a large natural rock pool 5-10min walk down the beach for sea swimming
text: Huge rooms, fantastic food, spotlessly clean and a relaxed atmosphere away from the crowds with the best service from the friendly staff you could imagine. Nick, the charming resident owner, has created somewhere very special and makes sure that everything runs perfectly. As well as enjoying the great food and pool, we took a tuk-tuk to a local rock temple and saw turtles on the local beach.
title: Best service and food you could imagine

ownerResponse:

placeInfo: {'id': '1943029', 'name': 'Buckingham Place', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 1184, 'locationString': 'Rekawa, Netolpitiya, Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.047304, 'longitude': 80.855316, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g2260795-d1943029-Reviews-Buckingham_Place-Rekawa_Netolpitiya_Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://buckinghamplace.lk/', 'address': 'Rekawa Beach Road Rekawa Village, Rekawa, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Rekawa Beach Road', 'street2': 'Rekawa Village', 'city': 'Rekawa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 1, 'count3': 9, 'count4': 30, 'count5': 1143}}
text:
Wow! It is the best place we have ever stayed! 

As soon as we arrived at Buckingham Place, we were greeted and welcomed with excellent service. Throughout the stay, the service was outstanding, and nothing was too much trouble.

The food was out of this world. The service was fantastic, with water being topped up without even being asked and a different menu every night for dinner. The food on the menu had excellent choices to suit everyone. Some of the best meals we have ever had. Indeed, some amazing chefs!! 

The waiters were superb! They were always ready to welcome you. They welcomed you into the restaurant and bar area always with a smile and prepared to attend to your needs. We have never had service like this before. Just fantastic!!

During our first night, Nick, the owner, came over to introduce himself. He was so welcoming and made sure everything was perfect throughout our stay. He truly is a fantastic person who has done so much for Sri Lanka and is changing so many lives. It was a pleasure to meet Nick and get to know him. We enjoyed spending time with Nick and hearing about his time in Sri Lanka. 

Kalpa, the guest manager, was fantastic with our every need. Nothing was too much hassle. Even when we needed him very late one night, he was more than happy to help. Kapla was always there to check everything was perfect!

The room was beautiful! So much space and lovely decor. The room was cleaned when needed, and nothing was too much trouble. 

The spa was one of the best massages we have ever had. The service and choice of treatments was perfect. We felt so relaxed after our treatments.

Overall, we would recommend this hotel to everyone! You must visit this hotel while in Sri Lanka!! You won’t regret it! We can’t wait to go back again. Thank you to all the fantastic team for making our stay so memorable. 

Nicole and Kaidyn 
Jersey
title: The best place We have ever stayed!!
