placeInfo: {'id': '13174370', 'name': 'Ananya Beach Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 118, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.063272, 'longitude': 80.88817, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d13174370-Reviews-Ananya_Beach_Resort-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': None, 'address': 'Modara Beach Road Rekawa, Wellodeya, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Modara Beach Road', 'street2': 'Rekawa, Wellodeya', 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 1, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 4, 'count4': 8, 'count5': 105}}
text: Wonderful in every way.  The location is amazing, the beach and pool are beautiful, the food is good and because they do not have the mandatory buffet like all the other hotels and resort seem to offer, you can actually order what you want and even save money.  Like the other reviews mention, this hotel is a real gem - you'll spend a little more than you might for some other hotels in this area, but you will not be disappointed in the rooms, the wonderful staff, the cleanliness, the pool, etc.  We'd love to come back and have recommended this place as a must-stay for people traveling around Sri Lanka.
title: Absolutely wonderful

text: We loved Ananya and would recommend it very highly. The resort is in a wonderful position on a long sandy beach with only a few other resorts in sight. The staff are fantastic- very polite and helpful and friendly. The swimming pool is lovely and it is so relaxing to sit looking at the sea from the beach. The rooms are spacious and very comfortable and the views from the balconies in the front are spectacular especially at night. Breakfasts are delicious - try the hoppers! We came back to Ananya at the end of our trip around Sri Lanka because we enjoyed it so much. Thank you Ananya team!

placeInfo: {'id': '12431181', 'name': 'Sooriya Resort & Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 340, 'locationString': 'Rekawa, Netolpitiya, Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.047694, 'longitude': 80.86558, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g2260795-d12431181-Reviews-Sooriya_Resort_Spa-Rekawa_Netolpitiya_Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.sooriya.com', 'address': 'Oruwella Road, Rekawa, Tangalle 82135 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Oruwella Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Rekawa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82135'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 24, 'count2': 11, 'count3': 27, 'count4': 71, 'count5': 207}}
roomTip: Highley recommended
text:
We stayed here for 2 nights for family reunion and absolutely loved it. The view from our balcony and the pool area is to die for, it’s really something.

All the  staff starting from Prasanna to Excretive chef  with his experience and knowledge about food are next level and can’t do enough for us, they just want you to have a wonderful time. They are great!

Our room was perfectly fine, just a big high ceilinged room, that was very clean and all we needed - admittedly room are very big. As they only provide a king size bed and one single for my wee girl
Air con work very well too.

The pool and loungers are really nice. The kids loved the pool and seeing the sea front too.

The sunrise here is spectacular !!!

The food was next level - breakfast was included and there’s a varied choice and a lovely Curry's and Sri Lankan style breakfast too, fruit platter every morning. Dinner is from a varied menu and again Our BBQ night was unreal,,

I also highly recommend the Executive chef's Knowledge and experience about food and creativity, please educate all the young chefs who wants to be chef like you.    what a day out that was I have learn lot from you on those two days of stay.

We would 100% stay here again and I think 2 nights is about right if you are foodies like us. This is the perfect place to switch off from the world, it’s a little slice of paradise.

Thanks for their wonderful hospitality and we hope to return next year.
title: Family Reunion from UK,IRELAND AND AUSTRALIA

placeInfo: {'id': '12431181', 'name': 'Sooriya Resort & Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 340, 'locationString': 'Rekawa, Netolpitiya, Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.047694, 'longitude': 80.86558, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g2260795-d12431181-Reviews-Sooriya_Resort_Spa-Rekawa_Netolpitiya_Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.sooriya.com', 'address': 'Oruwella Road, Rekawa, Tangalle 82135 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Oruwella Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Rekawa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82135'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 24, 'count2': 11, 'count3': 27, 'count4': 71, 'count5': 207}}
text:
We recently had the opportunity to stay at Sooriya Resort and Spa in Rekawa. This hotel is situated on a beautiful, unspoilt beach in the south, where you can observe typical fishing activities. It's also an ideal location for turtle enthusiasts, as turtles frequently visit the beach at the bottom of the hotel property.

The standout feature of Sooriya Resort and Spa is the exceptional level of service. Despite the hotel being fully booked on the first night of our stay, the staff handled everything seamlessly without any mishaps. The food was delicious, offering a good selection, and the staff were exceedingly friendly and accommodating.

The executive chef, a highly experienced professional with a background in several five-star hotels, explained the diverse menu choices. He also took the time to personally speak with guests and gather feedback, which we found impressive. Several staff members, including Chamika, Mishen, Chatushka, and Chandana, went above and beyond to make us feel at home with their excellent hospitality.

However, I rated the hotel four stars due to some significant design flaws and maintenance issues:

1. The car park is on a different property. Although it is well-secured, this setup is inconvenient.
2. The reception is in a separate building, which seems like an architectural oversight. Incorporating the reception into the main building and using the current reception area for parking would have been more practical and cost-effective.
3. There is a lot of wasted space on the second and third floors that could be transformed into a cafe, gym, library, or other useful facilities.
4. Maintenance details are lacking. In room 111, the main shower had a constant leak, the bidet shower was installed incorrectly, the toilet paper holder was poorly positioned, and there was no bedside table on one side of the bed.

Ultimately, the exceptional service from the staff elevated our experience, turning what could have been a two-star review into a four-star rating.
title: Excellent service

Your feedback about the buffet presentation is valuable, and I appreciate your suggestion. Details like these can indeed enhance the overall experience.  May I also add that as we are a independent hotel, that has faced natural and man-made calamities for the past 3 years.

placeInfo: {'id': '12431181', 'name': 'Sooriya Resort & Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 340, 'locationString': 'Rekawa, Netolpitiya, Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.047694, 'longitude': 80.86558, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g2260795-d12431181-Reviews-Sooriya_Resort_Spa-Rekawa_Netolpitiya_Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.sooriya.com', 'address': 'Oruwella Road, Rekawa, Tangalle 82135 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Oruwella Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Rekawa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82135'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 24, 'count2': 11, 'count3': 27, 'count4': 71, 'count5': 207}}
text:
We had a delightful stay at Sooriya Resort & Spa in Tangalle during June 2024. The hotel is situated in a fantastic spot in the Rekawa area, offering stunning views as it is surrounded by the sea. The rocky beach area around the hotel is serene and perfect for a relaxing getaway. We especially enjoyed witnessing both sunrise and sunset right from our bed – truly a magical experience.

The hotel staff were friendly and attentive, making our stay even more enjoyable. The rooms were quite spacious, providing a comfortable and pleasant atmosphere. It has a lovely pool area with a 4ft normal pool and a kids pool too.

The food was fine. As vegetarians, we anyway have a limited selection in buffets, but we noticed there were quite a good variety of options for others in general. The presentation of the buffet area and the overall atmosphere could use some improvement to match the high standards set by the rest of the resort. However, this minor detail did not overshadow our wonderful experience, and mentioning it here as a suggestion.

Additionally, hotel is kids-friendly, making it a great choice for families. We are already looking forward to a possible return in the future. We highly recommend this resort for anyone looking to unwind and enjoy the natural beauty of Tangalle.
title: Wonderful Stay at Sooriya Resort & Spa

placeInfo: {'id': '12431181', 'name': 'Sooriya Resort & Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 340, 'locationString': 'Rekawa, Netolpitiya, Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.047694, 'longitude': 80.86558, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g2260795-d12431181-Reviews-Sooriya_Resort_Spa-Rekawa_Netolpitiya_Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.sooriya.com', 'address': 'Oruwella Road, Rekawa, Tangalle 82135 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Oruwella Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Rekawa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82135'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 24, 'count2': 11, 'count3': 27, 'count4': 71, 'count5': 207}}
text: We were a little nervous with this booking - having seen wildly mixed reviews. But our experience was great. Tidy hotel. Clean and spacious room with all the amenities you would expect. Huge balcony with spectacular view over the pool to the ocean. The pool and area around it was great. The food was fine. The staff were very friendly and attentive. The lifeguard/pool manager/turtle guide was really lovely. He showed us to the beech and helped us spot the turtles. (Highlight of our stay). Thank you to all the team for a comfortable stay. Only issue was the WiFi which was a little unpredictable - mostly ok but dropped out several times. I did not see anything else to fault. So either the hotel has lifted its game or the horror reviews were fiction. If you treat the staff with the respect they deserve, you will have a fine time here.
title: A fine hotel with spectacular view

roomTip: Ask for an ocean view room and take advantage of the small beach just steps away from the hotel.
text: For all intent and purpose this was my final hotel stay while exploring Sri Lanka and it was the perfect ending.  It’s a first class property that is well maintained and well run.  It has amazing views of the ocean as I could watch the sunrise from my bed!  There is a small beach just a short walk from the hotel.  It’s also well situated for you to explore all of the local sites/activities.  The desk can arrange tours or rides to suit your needs.  I would highly recommend this property if you find yourself in Rekawa Beach!

ownerResponse:
{'id': '937669231', 'text': "I think your headline ‘Not a 4-star experience. It is not recommended for anyone to enjoy their vacation here’ is quite harsh and may reflect your own feelings. 

Other readers will always take a balanced view with comments by our local and overseas clients, but we want to assure you that we take your concerns seriously.

While we understand your frustration, we'd like to shed light on certain circumstances that were beyond our control.

Our initial plan for a buffet dinner was based on expecting over 20 guests. However, due to a last-minute cancellation and some guests choosing alternative dining options, we had fewer participants, making it challenging to maintain the full buffet spread. In such situations, we always opt for a set menu to ensure quality despite the smaller turnout. We apologise for any confusion or dissatisfaction this may have caused.

In your case, we accommodated your request for four persons in a room, although this is not normally allowed, by providing you with a spacious family room of 65 sq.m. We verified that the air conditioning was in proper working order during your stay. We are actively addressing the concerns raised about the extra bed with our housekeeping staff.

While we appreciate the detailed feedback provided here, we would like to emphasise that addressing concerns during your stay allows us to make immediate improvements. We are sad when our local guests feel that social media is the only outlet for expressing dissatisfaction as there is no language barrier.

 We encourage and invite all guests to communicate directly with us during their stay, enabling us to address issues promptly and ensure a more positive experience.
", 'lang': 'en', 'publishedDate': '2024-02-10', 'responder': None, 'connectionToSubject': None}
placeInfo: {'id': '12431181', 'name': 'Sooriya Resort & Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 340, 'locationString': 'Rekawa, Netolpitiya, Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.047694, 'longitude': 80.86558, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g2260795-d12431181-Reviews-Sooriya_Resort_Spa-Rekawa_Netolpitiya_Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.sooriya.com', 'address': 'Oruwella Road, Rekawa, Tangalle 82135 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Oruwella Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Rekawa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82135'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 24, 'count2': 11, 'count3': 27, 'count4': 71, 'count5': 207}}
text: The worst hotel I have even been to. The only good thing was the pool. We booked a room for 4 adults, but I think the room we got was a double room with 2 extra beds in it. One of the bed was made of two mattresses kept together. And the cooling was not working properly. We were told that we would have a buffet for all meals as the hotel is fully booked, so we booked full board for two days. But after arriving at the hotel after a long ride from Colombo, they are telling us that they had 8 rooms booked cancelled, so there will be no buffets. After explaining, they said they would give the breakfast and the dinner as a buffet, so we agreed. The hotel said we should make the full payment, so we did it. After some hours, they said that the dinner buffet was also canceled. So we had to stay for one night and leave the hotel. The dinner menu was set, but we had just two options to select from, which didn't have an option for vegetarians. Also, deserts had two options. We had to make changes, which was really stressful. There is no one in the reception when we call for issues, so we had to walk to the front lobby, but still there was no one. We had to wait around 20 minutes for someone to get there for help. Also, there is very limited staff, and they work everywhere in the hotel, not specifically in one section. The staff is not educated with the hotel policies; we asked one person about the policies, and he was not sure, so we had to get to the reception again. As someone who has been to 4 and 5 star hotels, I am shocked that this is a 4 star hotel because the service is not 4 star, the buffet is cheap, and the food selection is not 4 star at all. So I would not recommend this hotel to anyone who is looking to enjoy their holiday.
title: Not a 4-star experience. It is not recommended for anyone to enjoy their vacation here.

ownerResponse:
{'id': '937954787', 'text': "In recent times, a small minority of unscrupulous travelers have resorted to novel tactics, reminiscent of highway robbery, to tarnish the reputation of organizations for personal gain. The misuse or threat of using social media has become a common modus operandi for this cohort.

When the mentioned guest checked in, we graciously upgraded the guest to a 'suite with a Jacuzzi,' in addition to the discounted rate secured through booking.com. There were no complaints or requests made by the guest during the stay.

However, after departure, this guest contaccted the hotel, requesting a 50% reduction from the already discounted price, accompanied by a veiled threat to publish a damaging review stating that unless there is a significant discount given, there may be a negative review on soicial media.

Contrary to claims in the review our engineers thoroughly inspected the equipment, confirming their functionality and safety.", 'lang': 'en', 'publishedDate': '2024-02-13', 'responder': None, 'connectionToSubject': None}
placeInfo: {'id': '12431181', 'name': 'Sooriya Resort & Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 340, 'locationString': 'Rekawa, Netolpitiya, Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.047694, 'longitude': 80.86558, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g2260795-d12431181-Reviews-Sooriya_Resort_Spa-Rekawa_Netolpitiya_Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.sooriya.com', 'address': 'Oruwella Road, Rekawa, Tangalle 82135 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Oruwella Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Rekawa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82135'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 24, 'count2': 11, 'count3': 27, 'count4': 71, 'count5': 207}}
text:
I booked specifically so I could use the gym as I required a hotel with a fully equipped gym.

The hotel is tired and in a location on a rock. 
So you can not walk very far, just down to a tiny rocky beach

When I went to use the gym all the equipment except the free weights is broken, rusty and unusable. 
The multi gym is unsafe to use and should be taken out of action immediately.
It’s rusted and the pull up cord has come off the track. When I informed the hotel of this fact they did not acknowledge it. 
None of the cardio equipment turned on.
The gym is totally inadequate and missing my numerous items also. 
No treadmill
No mixture of free weight sizes
No flat bench to use of lifting weights 
No mirror.

When I notified the hotel of my concerns they would not acknowledge them. Plus had zero customer service. 
Look elsewhere to stay.
title: Tired hotel & bad customer service

roomTip: You can rent a motor bike and there are a lot of tour around there. contact staff.
text:
The great place to healing my mind. Every morning I woke up before 6 am. I can feel the sunrise rising from Indian Ocean. It is little hot, I jumped into the clean pool. Sometimes went down to the beach swam in the Indain Ocean. And fortunately I saw big turtles.
Food was very nice. Everyday I had latte with 4 sugars. It was my energy for starting a happy day. Head chef looks like a chef in the movie. They served diffent meals everyday and very nice. Better than other hotels.
I visited several hotels in Sri Lanka. There are a lot of nice hotel. But room condition, kindly staff, maintainance facilities, and quality of food.. Here is the best place of the same rated hotel.
I don't know when can I go to Sri Lanka again, I expect healing my mind in the Sooriya resort again.
title: The great place to healing

placeInfo: {'id': '12431181', 'name': 'Sooriya Resort & Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 340, 'locationString': 'Rekawa, Netolpitiya, Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.047694, 'longitude': 80.86558, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g2260795-d12431181-Reviews-Sooriya_Resort_Spa-Rekawa_Netolpitiya_Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.sooriya.com', 'address': 'Oruwella Road, Rekawa, Tangalle 82135 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Oruwella Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Rekawa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82135'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 24, 'count2': 11, 'count3': 27, 'count4': 71, 'count5': 207}}
roomTip: Donät make any direct bookings
text: Don't try to get in touch with the hotel directly to get the booking done. Chances are high they will skip your booking without giving any notice. Official booking confirmations and printscreens of your communication with hotel staff will not help you afterwards. Especially cool to get that kind of surprise while travelling with a family and planning to spend the New Year's night at the place. Thank you, Sooriya and Anthony personally, for arranging this entertainment for us!

placeInfo: {'id': '12431181', 'name': 'Sooriya Resort & Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 340, 'locationString': 'Rekawa, Netolpitiya, Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.047694, 'longitude': 80.86558, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g2260795-d12431181-Reviews-Sooriya_Resort_Spa-Rekawa_Netolpitiya_Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.sooriya.com', 'address': 'Oruwella Road, Rekawa, Tangalle 82135 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Oruwella Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Rekawa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82135'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 24, 'count2': 11, 'count3': 27, 'count4': 71, 'count5': 207}}
text: Huge rooms with balconies and perfect sea views.  5 stars views and 3 star facilities. A lovely pool. Bear in mind that the hotel is not close to a beach that is suitable for swimming, but the rock pools are good to explore. The hotel is showing signs of ageing, e.g. the elevator was broken and paint was peeling, but we enjoyed the peace and quiet - except for the endless music from one all-night beach party nearby! We were unable to book spa treatments because the spa was not really operating during the two days we stayed there, which was disappointing.
title: Worth it for the views; no beach swimming nearby

placeInfo: {'id': '3847500', 'name': 'Cinnabar Resort', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 453, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.039176, 'longitude': 80.8112, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d3847500-Reviews-Cinnabar_Resort-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://cinnabarresort.business.site/?utm_source=gmb&utm_medium=referral', 'address': 'Marakolliya Beach, Madilla Road, Tangalle, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Marakolliya Beach, Madilla Road, Tangalle ', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 22, 'count4': 68, 'count5': 341}}
text:
Would highly recommend this hotel for anyone seeking a relaxing and laid back getaway. The food is delicious and freshly prepared, and the pool area is beautiful and very well maintained. One of the highlights is the beach, which feels almost private. We loved lounging on the bean bags while watching the sunset in the evenings.

The staff are amazing, so friendly, attentive and always willing to go above and beyond to make your stay comfortable. For instance, when we were figuring out how to get to our next destination, they not only provided detailed bus information but also arranged a tuk-tuk spacious enough for our large bags and made sure we got on the right bus.

While the rooms don’t have air conditioning due to their open-air design, they are equipped with fans and mosquito nets, making the nights comfortable.
title: Relaxing beachfront hotel with amazing service

placeInfo: {'id': '3847500', 'name': 'Cinnabar Resort', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 453, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.039176, 'longitude': 80.8112, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d3847500-Reviews-Cinnabar_Resort-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://cinnabarresort.business.site/?utm_source=gmb&utm_medium=referral', 'address': 'Marakolliya Beach, Madilla Road, Tangalle, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Marakolliya Beach, Madilla Road, Tangalle ', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 22, 'count4': 68, 'count5': 341}}
text: Visited Cinnabar just for lunch today. Prompt service and the food was excellent. Good portion size and very tasty. Lovely location on a pretty beach. The experience was a bit spoilt by being shortchanged by 500 LKR. It was rectified once we pointed it out.
title: Tasty food but count your change!

placeInfo: {'id': '3847500', 'name': 'Cinnabar Resort', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 453, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.039176, 'longitude': 80.8112, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d3847500-Reviews-Cinnabar_Resort-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://cinnabarresort.business.site/?utm_source=gmb&utm_medium=referral', 'address': 'Marakolliya Beach, Madilla Road, Tangalle, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Marakolliya Beach, Madilla Road, Tangalle ', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 22, 'count4': 68, 'count5': 341}}
text: Someone had a dream and made it come true. If you have also dreamed of spending your vacation in a tree house by the beach, there is probably no better place. In addition, great food and friendly service, a fantastic swimming pool. Not many places deserve 5, but I have no doubts about this place. Just remember that you are in the jungle and communing with nature.
title: A dream tree house by the beach

placeInfo: {'id': '3847500', 'name': 'Cinnabar Resort', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 453, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.039176, 'longitude': 80.8112, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d3847500-Reviews-Cinnabar_Resort-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://cinnabarresort.business.site/?utm_source=gmb&utm_medium=referral', 'address': 'Marakolliya Beach, Madilla Road, Tangalle, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Marakolliya Beach, Madilla Road, Tangalle ', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 22, 'count4': 68, 'count5': 341}}
text:
We wanted to try different experiences in Sri Lanka and when I stumbled on the Cinnabar Resort it ticked the box. 
Our tree house was magnificent, spacious and clean but no room service we had to empty bins make beds and ask for clean towels. I have to say though that not all tree houses were of the same standard, our sons, bizarrely had a stick floor, very uncomfortable under foot and if you drop anything then it was gone on to the roof beneath , you also had an assault course of branches to limbo through to get to the toilet! 
They are very conscious about cleanliness around the resort, the foot pools are emptied and scrubbed daily, picking leafs up etc.
The restaurant was very good but beware of their suggestions for wine they don't show you the cheaper bottles, dismissing the yellow tail as "sweet", which it wasn't, we went with their suggestion and had a couple of bottles.... £34 per bottle!! not very happy!!The sea food was delicious!
So in conclusion, a truly beautiful place to stay and a wonderful experience just beware of the few negatives I've mentioned.
title: Beautiful but be aware.

placeInfo: {'id': '3847500', 'name': 'Cinnabar Resort', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 453, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.039176, 'longitude': 80.8112, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d3847500-Reviews-Cinnabar_Resort-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://cinnabarresort.business.site/?utm_source=gmb&utm_medium=referral', 'address': 'Marakolliya Beach, Madilla Road, Tangalle, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Marakolliya Beach, Madilla Road, Tangalle ', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 22, 'count4': 68, 'count5': 341}}
roomTip: Do not miss the seafood platter,  Master chef,  Organic food
text:
Best place in Sri Lanka so far!
Overwhelmed by the quirky, beautifully designed accommodation on a stunning corner of Sri Lanka. You can choose from a treehouse, a clay hut or little apartments set amongst nature, but right on the beach. We were able to view all of them and choose. Cinnabar is a quiet, mellow place to stay but with a great atmosphere. The restaurant food is sooooo tasty and they can't do enough for you. Everything is kept really clean and tidy and the brothers who run it are super friendly, but in a nice subtle way. Never trying to sell you anything, like in some places. They just want you to enjoy your time in Sri Lanka and get to know you as friends. The best places I've stayed in,in 7 weeks of being in Sri Lanka. Great italiano wood oven pizzeria,  seafood platter asome tosome,  best fusion cocktails in sri lanka which i had whole trip. Owner kamal very Help Full and also he's ex.chef is master i guess,  food and beverage menu was very Creative,  better than any Where else in thangalla... Thanks chef again wonderful menu and delicious selection.. 
We highly recommend this place to anyone and wish the Cinnabar team all the luck in the world as they truly deserve it! We will be back! X
title: Unforgettable summer holiday experience

placeInfo: {'id': '3847500', 'name': 'Cinnabar Resort', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 453, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.039176, 'longitude': 80.8112, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d3847500-Reviews-Cinnabar_Resort-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://cinnabarresort.business.site/?utm_source=gmb&utm_medium=referral', 'address': 'Marakolliya Beach, Madilla Road, Tangalle, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Marakolliya Beach, Madilla Road, Tangalle ', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 22, 'count4': 68, 'count5': 341}}
roomTip: The road to get to the property was a little flooded, so if arriving on foot maybe track the beach as long as possible to avoid this.
text:
We have LOVED our time staying at Cinnibar Resort and it’s been our favourite accommodation in Sri Lanka.

The location cannot be beat. Directly on Tangalle’s gorgeous beach (and a much quieter area) with breakfast served everyday looking out onto the ocean. Sun loungers and bean bags on the beach and plenty of cafe seating just in the shade.

They have a gorgeous swimming pool just set back from the ocean which is perfect for cooling off as the sea has a strong current and not recommended for swimming.

The grounds are lovely and quiet, with the occasional monkey and 3 seemingly resident dogs.

We stayed in a ground floor bungalow, but they also have treehouses and cabana style rooms which looked great. Room was comfortable with a mosquito net, fridge and safe. Bathroom was open plan with lots of room. We also had a small outside seating area which we didn’t use as we were always on the beach.

It’s around a 20 minute walk into Tangalle town centre which has shops, pharmacies and bakeries. Lots of restaurants nearby too and a short walk along the beach to other bars and resorts which look nice.

Breakfast was incredible, so well worth opting for a room with this included. There was a fruit course, hoppers, curry, rice, pancakes and fruit juices all on rotation and a choice of eggs.

We only ate at the resort once as we like exploring, and food was nice, but not the best we’ve had in the area. Cocktails however were fab and we made use of their 2-4-1 happy hour between 6pm-7pm most nights.

Service was great, really friendly and they remembered our names which was a nice touch as they seemed to be continually at capacity.

Overall we LOVED our stay here and can’t wait to come back.
title: 10/10 must stay if you’re in Tangalle.

placeInfo: {'id': '3847500', 'name': 'Cinnabar Resort', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 453, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.039176, 'longitude': 80.8112, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d3847500-Reviews-Cinnabar_Resort-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://cinnabarresort.business.site/?utm_source=gmb&utm_medium=referral', 'address': 'Marakolliya Beach, Madilla Road, Tangalle, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Marakolliya Beach, Madilla Road, Tangalle ', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 22, 'count4': 68, 'count5': 341}}
text:
THEY DO NOT ACCEPT CREDIT CARDS. It doesn't say this anywhere, but this is the case. Other than that, this is a really special place that makes you feel a million miles away from everything. Sadly, it was raining most of the days I was there - but it was still a great place to hang out. There is a nice pool and a decent restaurant (some things were better than others). If you like bespoke cocktails, they try to do their best. They clean the pool and the grounds continuously. 

I was there for three nights, but at the end of my stay, I barely got a goodbye, thank you, or "how was your stay". They clearly try to meet the standards of international hospitality, but there are still a few areas where they fall a little short. If you want a swimmable beach, this is not the place to be. You have to go elsewhere for that - and because it was so rainy I don't even know where I would go.

Because it was rainy, the room (which is palapa-esque) was very damp the whole time and nothing dried. No a/c, but there is a fan. No screens on bathroom windows - so moquitoes do come in. The bed has a mosquito net - lots of tiny gnats on my white sheets when I first got there (dead ones), but that's nature.
title: Special place, but go elsewhere for a swimmable beach

placeInfo: {'id': '599203', 'name': 'Eva Lanka Hotel - Beach & Wellness', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 343, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.003487, 'longitude': 80.7618, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d599203-Reviews-Eva_Lanka_Hotel_Beach_Wellness-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.eva.lk/', 'address': 'Tangalle A2, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Tangalle A2', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 13, 'count2': 18, 'count3': 49, 'count4': 86, 'count5': 177}}
text: The hotel was spread out with several chalets and provided guests with one of the most spectacular views you will see in coastal Sr Lanka. This is not the most luxurious hotel in the country, but it deserves its 4-star rating. We thought it provided excellent value for money.
title: Excellent hotel in Tangalle with amazing coastal views.

placeInfo: {'id': '599203', 'name': 'Eva Lanka Hotel - Beach & Wellness', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 343, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.003487, 'longitude': 80.7618, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d599203-Reviews-Eva_Lanka_Hotel_Beach_Wellness-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.eva.lk/', 'address': 'Tangalle A2, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Tangalle A2', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 13, 'count2': 18, 'count3': 49, 'count4': 86, 'count5': 177}}
text:
No word, just like no picture could ever make justice of this magical place where you’ll feel like in paradise. If you are looking for excessive luxury this ain’t your spot but if you do love to feel like home whilst being immerse in wonderful nature I couldn’t recommend more this family run hotel.  The harmony and peace all around you will make you happy to actually be there and you won’t miss any kind of comfort. The beach is just few steps away from your room and even if it is not private, it’s just like a private tropical beach with calm waters and nice, lively reef. You also have 2 swimming pools if you’d like to hang out after a great massage or an excellent breakfast. 
Staff is awesome and extremely friendly as well as incredibly helpful. Davide and Francesca are a lovely couple who manage the whole thing and it won’t take you long to realize that it’s just like a big family  ( from the gardener to the receptionist ) welcoming you at you Eva Lanka with a common goal of making your staying unforgettable. My week with them was a perfect compromise in a classy and stylish but very authentic place.  Absolutely loved it !
title: Authentic comfort in paradise while feeling like at home

placeInfo: {'id': '599203', 'name': 'Eva Lanka Hotel - Beach & Wellness', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 343, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.003487, 'longitude': 80.7618, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d599203-Reviews-Eva_Lanka_Hotel_Beach_Wellness-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.eva.lk/', 'address': 'Tangalle A2, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Tangalle A2', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 13, 'count2': 18, 'count3': 49, 'count4': 86, 'count5': 177}}
text:
if you are looking for a quiet place surrounded by nature with large spaces, Evalanka is definitely the ideal place. we were well welcomed, pampered and looked after in everything. The Spa offers Ayurveda massages performed by expert therapists, spacious rooms and a breathtaking view. we will definitely be back! congratulations to Davide and Francesca who make this place unique and special, a true pearl overlooking the Indian Sea

Luca&Guenda
title: Fantastic Paradise

placeInfo: {'id': '599203', 'name': 'Eva Lanka Hotel - Beach & Wellness', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 343, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.003487, 'longitude': 80.7618, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d599203-Reviews-Eva_Lanka_Hotel_Beach_Wellness-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.eva.lk/', 'address': 'Tangalle A2, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Tangalle A2', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 13, 'count2': 18, 'count3': 49, 'count4': 86, 'count5': 177}}
text:
We have spent over 1 month here with my family, my 20 year old and my 4 months old babies.

Great value for money!

The Italian owners and the staff have been incredibly accommodating with the weirdest requests we had, always available, professional al and kind.

The structure is perfect for a family also with young kids like mine. It’s very clean and safe.

We met amazing people during our stay, from many different countries and different backgrounds (families with children, nomadic workers, retired couples, teenagers, young adults…). It was very enriching.

The location is incredible, just above a fantastic paradise beach, still undiscovered by the main tourism and one of the only ones in the area in which is safe to swim in (there are no dangerous currents).

You can see turtles and beautiful fish if the visibility is good.

We had the chance to do excursions that were really well organised, and they also arranged to find a very good babysitter for our 4 months old.

Ayurveda massages are great and the therapists and the doctor helped us a lot with a few health issues we had during our stay.

I would definitely recommend it and I am looking forward to come back in the near future!
title: Perfect dream holiday in paradise

placeInfo: {'id': '599203', 'name': 'Eva Lanka Hotel - Beach & Wellness', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 343, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.003487, 'longitude': 80.7618, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d599203-Reviews-Eva_Lanka_Hotel_Beach_Wellness-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.eva.lk/', 'address': 'Tangalle A2, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Tangalle A2', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 13, 'count2': 18, 'count3': 49, 'count4': 86, 'count5': 177}}
text: We had a wonderful stay here, we stayed 5 nights and wished we could have stayed longer. The rooms were very spacious and nice, loved that they serviced the rooms everyday and left us fresh water, really thoughtful. The staff were all very nice and welcoming, the food in the restaurant was great and the breakfast buffet was very nice too. The pools were both great and the children really enjoyed them. I was perfect that we could walk to the beach and there was a great little area where the sea was very calm for the children to play. We met the owner and her husband a few times and they were both so nice, they have some exciting plans going forward and we would stay again at the drop of a hat.
title: Lovely stay

placeInfo: {'id': '599203', 'name': 'Eva Lanka Hotel - Beach & Wellness', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 343, 'locationString': 'Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.003487, 'longitude': 80.7618, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304142-d599203-Reviews-Eva_Lanka_Hotel_Beach_Wellness-Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.eva.lk/', 'address': 'Tangalle A2, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Tangalle A2', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Tangalle', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 13, 'count2': 18, 'count3': 49, 'count4': 86, 'count5': 177}}
roomTip: Avoid beach boys offering anything to you, not bring expensive devices and more money then you need for lunch or cocktail to beach.
text: Very good calm place to stay with family. Big territory with 2 swimming pools and bounty beach in front of hotel. Staff is super friendly and trying to help when it is needed.  Rooms are big with conditioner, room service every day. Breakfast was a little bit boring because same food every day and limited options. Hotel staying on hill, so all time you should go up and down, we really like it (to have fitness), same time for people with locomotion problems that could be hard to manage. You could also have experience to see peacocks, squirrels, monkeys on territory. Be aware that beach is not belong to hotel and hotel management is not responsible for your security and your staff. We had bad experience when first day some of “beach boys” stolen money bag on the beach. Same time place nearby restaurant is safe because restaurants owner is looking for your comfort and security. In summary if you like beauty of nature, calm vacation on beautiful beach that place for you.
title: Family vacations with positive experience.

placeInfo: {'id': '1674695', 'name': 'Turtle Bay', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 579, 'locationString': 'Kalametiya, Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.076252, 'longitude': 80.93355, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g12269767-d1674695-Reviews-Turtle_Bay-Kalametiya_Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.turtlebay.lk', 'address': 'Gurupokuna Road, Kalametiya, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Gurupokuna Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Kalametiya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 9, 'count3': 22, 'count4': 104, 'count5': 434}}
text: We booked a single night in September as we travelled from Ella to Galle. It’s a little gem of a hotel. The whole place is a little dated but the room was big and a had balcony with an ocean view. The staff were amazing and quite funny, and it was great to speak with Fernando the chef. The food at dinner was excellent, especially the black pork curry,  and it was exceptionally good value. I’d definitely consider staying longer next time we’re in Sri Lanka.
title: A little gem of a hotel

placeInfo: {'id': '1674695', 'name': 'Turtle Bay', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 579, 'locationString': 'Kalametiya, Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.076252, 'longitude': 80.93355, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g12269767-d1674695-Reviews-Turtle_Bay-Kalametiya_Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.turtlebay.lk', 'address': 'Gurupokuna Road, Kalametiya, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Gurupokuna Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Kalametiya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 9, 'count3': 22, 'count4': 104, 'count5': 434}}
text:
Do not hesitate to stay here, it is an amazing small hotel. Wonderful wild beach and plenty of shady areas in the garden with loungers. Tea and snacks brought with smiles! Prawns to die for served beside the pool lit by glittering fairy lights.
Wonderful staff who couldn't do enough for us. Dawn boat ride at the bird sanctuary a must and fishing harbour very interesting. Both 5 minute walk away. 
Love to all at Turtle Bay.

text: We spent two nights at this wonderful small hotel.  Room was tastefully furnished and the bed incredibly comfortable.   Staff were kind and friendly and the location idyllic.  Kalametiya is a lovely spot with a near deserted beach, tranquil atmosphere and busy   fishing harbour to explore.

text: What a little paradise on earth this place is! We absolutely loved our stay, with delicious food, the most amazing staff and stunning views. I cannot recommend Turtle Bay enough. placeInfo: {'id': '1674695', 'name': 'Turtle Bay', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 579, 'locationString': 'Kalametiya, Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.076252, 'longitude': 80.93355, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g12269767-d1674695-Reviews-Turtle_Bay-Kalametiya_Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.turtlebay.lk', 'address': 'Gurupokuna Road, Kalametiya, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Gurupokuna Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Kalametiya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 9, 'count3': 22, 'count4': 104, 'count5': 434}}
roomTip: It's very secluded with not a lot around it, but the food at the hotel is very, very good.
text: This is such a superb, friendly boutique hotel in an amazing location.  The staff are excellent (especially Rajitha - every hotel should have a Rajitha ;-)). With 7 rooms its almost like a homestay - simply yet beautifully presented. The food is amazing and its located on a beautiful and very quiet beach. This is a place to come to rejuvenate and chill out and as a real bonus, it's incredible value for money!
title: Superb, friendly boutique hotel in an amazing location

placeInfo: {'id': '1674695', 'name': 'Turtle Bay', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 579, 'locationString': 'Kalametiya, Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.076252, 'longitude': 80.93355, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g12269767-d1674695-Reviews-Turtle_Bay-Kalametiya_Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.turtlebay.lk', 'address': 'Gurupokuna Road, Kalametiya, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Gurupokuna Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Kalametiya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 9, 'count3': 22, 'count4': 104, 'count5': 434}}
text:
We got recommended Turtle Bay from a friend who had stayed there years ago and were able to spend four days there during our trip this February. We were already looking forward to it before arrival. And we can truly say that our stay went even beyond our expectations. Firstly, what we really loved is the location. Much less exploited tourist-wise, although there are good options restaurant- and activity-wise around. 
Secondly, the hotel is absolutely charming, with few rooms in authentic Sri Lankan style and amazing views on the sea. Beautiful restaurant, pool and garden area also. 
Thirdly, and most importantly: Their fantastic staff. The chef and his team cooked amazingly, probably our best meals on the entire trip. Highly recommend the Sri Lankan curry selection and the sea food suggestions. They even organized a special Sri Lankan street food evening with Kottu Roti, as we had not tried it before. All staff was absolutely wonderful and our maitre Raji was simply amazing. We also did several ayurvedic treatements with Chandrani, which we can absolutely recommend. And Yoga with Amal, who is excellent too. We had our rooms prepared every day with beautiful flowers. Everyone was so kind and made us feel immediately home. Will definetly visit again when back in Sri Lanka! Thank you Turtle Bay team for making our stay magical!
title: A truly Sri Lankan oasis

placeInfo: {'id': '1674695', 'name': 'Turtle Bay', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 579, 'locationString': 'Kalametiya, Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.076252, 'longitude': 80.93355, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g12269767-d1674695-Reviews-Turtle_Bay-Kalametiya_Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.turtlebay.lk', 'address': 'Gurupokuna Road, Kalametiya, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Gurupokuna Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Kalametiya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 10, 'count2': 9, 'count3': 22, 'count4': 104, 'count5': 434}}
roomTip: This is one of the prettiest pools Ive ever seen because at night  it looks like starlight, I haven't encountered this elsewhere.
text:
We absolutely loved our stay at Turtle Bay, it was such a happy experience in every way. The hotel itself is very spacious and comfortable, the rooms are large and airy and feature all that one could need. Hair dryer, mini fridge, nice sitting out balcony, comfortable beds, pillows and cotton linen.
The staff were some of the nicest most accommodating and charming that Ive encountered anywhere.  I had my 70th birthday here with a group of some family members  and friends and the hotel made a massive effort to make it a very happy occasion, organising  a special seafood dinner on the terrace poolside, and a wonderful chocolate cake as well.
This is a wonderful choice for a group of people holidaying together as it feels as though you are in your own house party but with lots of meal choices available!  Food is very good, and it is very fairly priced, making it extremely good value.
Thank you Turtle Bay you gave us a wonderful stay, and I would recommend anyone to visit you.
title: Charming hotel situated on a very unspoilt and pretty beach - I highly recommend

placeInfo: {'id': '12513822', 'name': 'Lankavatara Ocean Retreat & Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 179, 'locationString': 'Kalametiya, Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.075052, 'longitude': 80.9254, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g12269767-d12513822-Reviews-Lankavatara_Ocean_Retreat_Spa-Kalametiya_Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.facebook.com/LankavataraOceanRetreat/', 'address': 'Kahadamodara Road, Kalametiya, Tangalle 82120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Kahadamodara Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Kalametiya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 6, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 8, 'count4': 38, 'count5': 125}}
text:
Our second visit to Lankavatara SPA Hotel surpassed our expectations! Returning after a year, we were greeted by the same serene beach, the warmth and hospitality of the Sri Lankan staff, and notably improved culinary experiences courtesy of the kitchen team.

Our room nr. 8 (Front ocean view) was as clean and well-maintained as a year ago. Anousha – the best masseuses in the world – still works at the SPA, and the overall vibe of the hotel is as relaxed but attentive as before. It seems the kitchen staff has changed, so the consistency, flavours and quality of food of the main restaurant have massively improved.

Unfortunately, the beach did suffer some erosion during the heavy rains of the 2023 winter months, causing parts of it to collapse and wash away. This is a regrettable occurrence, not only for the natural beauty of the area but also for the local fishermen who now face increased challenges during their daily fishing trips. However, despite these changes, the wilderness experience remains unspoiled—the empty golden beach stretches endlessly. We loved it here, and highly recommend the hotel to other travellers.
title: A gem of the region (returning guests)

placeInfo: {'id': '12513822', 'name': 'Lankavatara Ocean Retreat & Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 179, 'locationString': 'Kalametiya, Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.075052, 'longitude': 80.9254, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g12269767-d12513822-Reviews-Lankavatara_Ocean_Retreat_Spa-Kalametiya_Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.facebook.com/LankavataraOceanRetreat/', 'address': 'Kahadamodara Road, Kalametiya, Tangalle 82120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Kahadamodara Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Kalametiya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 6, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 8, 'count4': 38, 'count5': 125}}
text:
Lankavatara is situated about 30 minutes from Tangalle, in Kalametiya. The resort is beautiful and the rooms were clean and spacious. Staff was friendly and helpful. The meals were delicious too. 
It really is the best looking hotel in the area!
There is beach access from the hotel but it was advised not to swim by the staff, which was slightly disappointing. But overall a good place to relax.
title: Relaxing setting

placeInfo: {'id': '12513822', 'name': 'Lankavatara Ocean Retreat & Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 179, 'locationString': 'Kalametiya, Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.075052, 'longitude': 80.9254, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g12269767-d12513822-Reviews-Lankavatara_Ocean_Retreat_Spa-Kalametiya_Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.facebook.com/LankavataraOceanRetreat/', 'address': 'Kahadamodara Road, Kalametiya, Tangalle 82120 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Kahadamodara Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Kalametiya', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82120'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 6, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 8, 'count4': 38, 'count5': 125}}
text:
I was only able to stay at this gorgeous hotel for one night but everything from the informative and helpful checkin to the restaurant’s delicious food was top notch! I got a massage twice at their lovely little spa (also reasonably priced) and ate two dinner meals and breakfast at their restaurant- it was all of excellent quality, tasty and fresh. 
The staff was so kind and helpful - assisting me in my transportation needs beyond the area. 
The rooms are super comfortable, clean and nicely decorated. Sure it’s a bit more but you get what you pay for!  Great choice on a beautiful out of the way beach in Sri!!
title: A absolute delight - 5 star small resort!

placeInfo: {'id': '7277650', 'name': 'Ananthaya Beach', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 196, 'locationString': 'Rekawa, Netolpitiya, Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.053045, 'longitude': 80.86571, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g2260795-d7277650-Reviews-Ananthaya_Beach-Rekawa_Netolpitiya_Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.ananthayabeach.com', 'address': 'Oruwella Road, Rekawa, Tangalle 82135 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Oruwella Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Rekawa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82135'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 7, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 7, 'count4': 24, 'count5': 156}}
roomTip: Top floor room a must.
text:
We stayed here for three nights and absolutely loved it. The view from your balcony and the pool area is to die for, it’s really something.

The staff and owner are really friendly and can’t do enough for you, they just want you to have a nice time. They are great!

Our room was perfectly fine, nothing fancy, just a big high ceilinged room, that was very clean and all we needed, it slept two adults and two young kids - admittedly the youngest had to sleep in with us. As they only provide a king size bed and one single.
Not sure if you can request an extra bed but for three nights we more than comfortable.

The pool and loungers are really nice. The kids loved the pool and seeing the wildlife too.

The sunrise here is spectacular but the way.

The food was ok - breakfast was included and there’s a varied choice and a lovely fruit platter every morning. Dinner is from a varied menu and again it’s ok, it’s very cheap, but portions are on the smaller side. A family of four can eat for £25/£30 comfortably. 

We choose to eat out a couple of times and that’s nothing more than a short Tuk Tuk ride away. 

I also highly recommend the local bird sanctuary - what a day out that was.

We would 100% stay here again and I think 3 nights is about right if you are foodies like us. This is the perfect place to switch off from the world, it’s a little slice of paradise. 

Thanks for their wonderful hospitality and we hope to return one day.
title: Beautifully basic

text: In January we spent 3 days in Anathaya beach. Wonderful place. Clean, spacious room, nice view,  tasty food and absolutely amazing friendly and helpful staff. Thank you for the hospitality. Hope to see you again.
title: Wonderful place

placeInfo: {'id': '7277650', 'name': 'Ananthaya Beach', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 196, 'locationString': 'Rekawa, Netolpitiya, Tangalle, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.053045, 'longitude': 80.86571, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g2260795-d7277650-Reviews-Ananthaya_Beach-Rekawa_Netolpitiya_Tangalle_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.ananthayabeach.com', 'address': 'Oruwella Road, Rekawa, Tangalle 82135 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Oruwella Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Rekawa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '82135'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 7, 'count2': 2, 'count3': 7, 'count4': 24, 'count5': 156}}
text: We enjoyed a lovely couple of days at this small hotel with on-site restaurant and a massage centre over the road.  Rooms are sizeable and functional.  Pool and rooms enjoy stunning views over the ocean and sunrise. Its a short walk to the beach which was largely deserted: certainly no beach side bars.  Swimming didn't look safe to us on the main beach beyond the breakwater.   There is a simple, small beach side restaurant about 1 km away -  lovely walk down deserted lane.  Tangalle beaches are 30 min drive -  fine if you've got a driver.  Great place if you're looking for somewhere a bit "off grid".
title: Off grid stay near Tangalle
